price: 147. Yalli sin digaalamat maa- tuxxiqlee maca kak abaa? Kaa faatitteeniih kaa kee kay farmoyta Nummasseenik, Yalli isi naqoosa Qibaadak kaah Abtem keenik faatitah, usuk ummaanim yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: مَّا يَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمۡ إِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ وَءَامَنتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
